value.title: Harstem ABUSES most OP unit against my Protoss team | Commander Mode #3 - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: What is Commander Mode? It is Archon Mode vs another streamer/player where we are the Commanders of our squadron of noobs but we can't actively control anything ourselves, we can only command them what to do!   This time we go up against an actual Captain, HARSTEM! Here's his viewpoint: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wIjJ2uA6_ig&ab_channel=Harstem
